Detailed Description

Pure static class to encapsulate some generic system calls.

Member Function Documentation

void System::AddAppContainer (  AppContainer *  app_cont  )  [static]
 

AppContainer * System::GetActiveAppContainer (   )  [static]
 

Returns:
Pointer to the currently active application container.

Application * System::GetActiveApplication (   )  [static]
 

When calling this method while running in the context of an application, the return value always is the pointer to the application. However, calling this method in a non application context returns 0. This is for example in the callback function of a SystemTimer. Note that this method does not return the currently focused application; to get the focused application System::GetFocusedApplication must be invoked.

Returns:
Pointer to the currently active application or 0.

ColorValue System::GetColorValue (  SystemColorId  system_color_id  )  [static]
 

Returns:
The color value for the system color specified by system color.

AppContainer * System::GetFirstAppContainer (   )  [static]
 

Returns:
Pointer to the first application container in the list of all APOXI threads.

AppContainer * System::GetFocusedAppContainer (   )  [static]
 

Returns:
Pointer to the application container with the focused application.

Application * System::GetFocusedApplication (   )  [static]
 

Returns:
Pointer to the focused application of all application containers. The focused application is the application which will receive all key presses. The focused application can be but is not necessarily the active application (see System::GetActiveApplication).

const Font & System::GetFont (  SystemFontId  system_font_id  )  [static]
 

Returns:
The font identifier for the system font specified by system_font_id

void System::GrabFocus (  Application *  app,
INT  priority,
BOOLEAN  assign_to_win
)  [static]
 

Obsolete - use System::GrabFocus(Application* app) instead.

BOOLEAN System::GrabFocus (  Application *  app  )  [static]
 

Tries to grab the focus for the application app.

Returns:
TRUE is returned, if the application will get the focus. Note that the grabbing of the focus is done asynchronously, which means that invoking Application::HasFocus immediatly after invoking System::GrabFocus will return FALSE.

void System::Init (  ExternalCommunicationHandler *  external_communicator = 0  )  [static]

BOOLEAN System::ShutDown (  BOOLEAN  force = FALSE,
ShutDown::Mode  mode = ShutDown::PowerOff
)  [static]
 

Starts the shut-down sequence. First the applications are checked if shutting down is allowed. If so, ShutDown::Execute is called which posts the AppCloseMsg to all applications and waits until all APOXI threads are terminated.

Parameters:
force FALSE: shutdown only when all applications allow it TRUE: immediately shutdown.
mode shut-down mode. See ShutDown::Mode.
Returns:
TRUE, if shutdown is allowed an has been started.
See also:
Application::SetShutdownAllowed
